â”‚  1. âœ… Checkout Code                                            â”‚
â”‚  2. âœ… Setup Java 17                                            â”‚
â”‚  3. âœ… Setup Flutter 3.24.0                                     â”‚
â”‚  4. âœ… Install Dependencies (flutter pub get)                  â”‚
â”‚  5. âœ… Generate Code (build_runner)                            â”‚
â”‚  6. âœ… Analyze Code (flutter analyze)                          â”‚
â”‚  7. âœ… Run Tests (flutter test)                                â”‚
â”‚  8. âœ… Build APK (flutter build apk --release)                 â”‚
â”‚  9. âœ… Build App Bundle (flutter build appbundle --release)    â”‚
â”‚ 10. âœ… Create Release Notes                                     â”‚
â”‚ 11. âœ… Upload APK Artifact                                      â”‚
â”‚ 12. âœ… Upload App Bundle Artifact                               â”‚
â”‚ 13. âœ… Upload Release Notes                                     â”‚

## ğŸ”„ Workflow Triggers

### Automatic Triggers
```
Push Event
    â†“
main/master branch?
    â†“ YES
Run build-android job
    â†“
Generate & Upload Artifacts
```

### Manual Triggers
```
User clicks "Run Workflow"
    â†“
Select Options:
  [ ] Deploy to Play Store
  [ ] Deploy to App Store
    â†“
Click "Run Workflow"
    â†“
Run selected jobs
```

## ğŸ¯ User Interaction Points

### For End Users
```
GitHub Actions
    â†“
[View Workflow Runs]
    â†“
[Select Latest Run]
    â†“
[Scroll to Artifacts]
    â†“
[Click android-apk-release]
    â†“
[Download APK]
    â†“
[Install on Device]
```

### For Developers
```
Code Changes
    â†“
[git commit]
    â†“
[git push origin main]
    â†“
[Wait for Build]
    â†“
[Check Status Badge]
    â†“
[Download & Test APK]
```

### For Release Managers
```
[Go to Actions]
    â†“
[Click "Build and Deploy"]
    â†“
[Click "Run workflow"]
    â†“
[Select Branch]
    â†“
[Check Deployment Options]
    â†“
[Run Workflow]
    â†“
[Monitor Progress]
    â†“
[Verify Deployment]
```

## âš™ï¸ Configuration States

### Current State (Active)

âœ… Automatic APK builds
âœ… Code quality checks
âœ… Test execution
âœ… Artifact uploads
âœ… 30-day retention
```

â³ Play Store deployment

ğŸ’¡ Beta testing tracks

ğŸ’¡ Automated screenshot testing

## ğŸ” Security Flow

```
Code Push
    â†“

    â†“

    â†“ (Encrypted)

    â†“

    â†“

    â†“

    â†“

    â†“

    â†“

    â†“

## ğŸ¨ Legend

- âœ… Active/Working
- â³ Pending Configuration
- ğŸ’¡ Future Enhancement
- ğŸ“¦ Artifact
- ğŸ”’ Requires Secrets
- ğŸ¯ User Action
- ğŸ”„ Automatic Process

**Note**: This flow represents the current implementation. As you configure secrets and enable deployment jobs, additional steps will become active.

See [DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md](../DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md) for setup instructions.
